alert.note: Alert for Jefferson and West Douglas Counties Above 6000 Feet, Gilpin, Clear Creek, Northeast Park Counties Below 9000 Feet; Larimer and Boulder Counties Between 6000 and 9000 Feet (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: High Wind Warning issued December 01 at 8:26PM MST until December 02 at 5:00PM MST by NWS Boulder
info.description: ...HIGH WIND WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 5 PM MST FRIDAY... * WHAT...West winds 30 to 40 mph with gusts up to 75 mph. * WHERE...The Front Range Foothills. * WHEN...Until 5 PM MST Friday. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds will blow around unsecured objects and scattered power outages may result. Travel will be difficult, especially for high profile vehicles.
info.instruction: Watch for falling debris and tree limbs. Winds this strong can make driving difficult, especially for high profile vehicles. Use extra caution.

area.areaDesc: Jefferson and West Douglas Counties Above 6000 Feet, Gilpin, Clear Creek, Northeast Park Counties Below 9000 Feet; Larimer and Boulder Counties Between 6000 and 9000 Feet
